campaigns.name: Night of the Zealot
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: Friday, September 18, 1925. Arkham, Massachusetts. There is something wrong with this town, and not a whole lot this old soothsayer can do to stop the slide...

campaigns.name: The Dunwich Legacy
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: A monstrous presence once terrorized the secluded village of Dunwich, until professors from Miskatonic University, armed with secret knowledge, allegedly defeated the creature...

campaigns.name: The Path to Carcosa
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: For weeks, the upcoming performance of the King in Yellow has been the talk of the town, but after researching the play's dark history, you are convinced something foul is at work...

campaigns.name: The Forgotten Age
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: When renowned archaeologist Alejandro Vela discovered the ruins of an ancient Aztec city, it set into motion a plot that could unravel the very fabric of time itself...

campaigns.name: The Circle Undone
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: While investigating the disappearances of four people from an estate in French Hill, you uncover a grim fate that is meant for the entirety of Arkham...

campaigns.name: The Dream-Eaters
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: After hearing occult author Virgil Gray's account of his experiences in the 'Dreamlands', you too find yourself lost in a hidden realm full of imagination and nightmare...

campaigns.name: The Innsmouth Conspiracy
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: In the shadowy seaport of Innsmouth, strange creatures have been sighted by the reef, and a tangled scheme involving a missing government agent has begun to unravel...

campaigns.name: Edge of the Earth
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: Deep within the icy continent of Antarctica lies a secret; one so ancient and profound, it threatens to tear apart our very understanding of the planet we call home...

campaigns.name: The Scarlet Keys
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: Strange disappearances haunt the city of Arkham, with items and people vanishing not just from existence, but from memory and history as well. Only you remember...

campaigns.name: The Feast of Hemlock Vale
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: When renowned botanist Dr. Rosa Marquez receives a strange sample from the secluded and mysterious Hemlock Isle, her instincts tell her that something is amiss. The investigators only have three days to find out what lurks beneath Hemlock Vale before its people meet a terrible fate.

campaigns.name: Return to The Night of the Zealot
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: Friday, September 18, 1925. Arkham, Massachusetts. There is something wrong with this town, and not a whole lot this old soothsayer can do to stop the slide...

campaigns.name: Return to The Dunwich Legacy
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: A monstrous presence once terrorized the secluded village of Dunwich, until professors from Miskatonic University, armed with secret knowledge, allegedly defeated the creature...

campaigns.name: Return to The Path to Carcosa
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: For weeks, the upcoming performance of the King in Yellow has been the talk of the town, but after researching the play's dark history, you are convinced something foul is at work...

campaigns.name: Return to The Forgotten Age
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: When renowned archaeologist Alejandro Vela discovered the ruins of an ancient Aztec city, it set into motion a plot that could unravel the very fabric of time itself...

campaigns.name: Return to The Circle Undone
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: While investigating the disappearances of four people from an estate in French Hill, you uncover a grim fate that is meant for the entirety of Arkham...

campaigns.name: 광신도의 밤
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 1925년 9월 18일 금요일. 매사추세츠 주 아컴. 이곳에서는 의문의 연쇄 실종 사건이 발생하고 있습니다. 어떤 끔찍한 고난과 공포가 기다리고 있을지...

campaigns.name: 던위치의 유산
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 한때 괴물 같은 존재가 던위치라는 한적한 마을을 공포에 떨게 했고, 비밀 지식으로 무장한 미스캐토닉 대학의 교수들이 그 생물을 물리쳤다고 합니다...

campaigns.name: 카르코사로 가는 길
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 몇 주 동안 다가오는 황색 옷을 입은 왕의 공연이 온 동네에서 화제가 되었지만, 연극의 어두운 역사를 조사한 후 당신은 뭔가 사악한 일이 일어나고 있다는 것을 확신하게 되었습니다...

campaigns.name: 잊힌 시대
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 유명한 고고학자 알레한드로 벨라가 고대 아즈텍 도시의 유적을 발견했을 때, 시간의 구조 자체를 풀 수 있는 음모가 시작되었습니다...

campaigns.name: 끝맺지 못한 의식
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 은빛 황혼회 주최 자선 행사장에서 실종 사건이 벌어지고 그것을 조사하던 당신은 숲에서 정신을 차리고 미지의 세력과 맞닥뜨립니다. 이건 안나 캐슬로가 말한 당신의 운명일까요?...

campaigns.name: 꿈을 먹는 자
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 오컬트 작가 버질 그레이의 '꿈의 땅'에서의 경험에 대한 이야기를 듣고 나면 당신도 상상과 악몽으로 가득 찬 숨겨진 영역에서 길을 잃은 자신을 발견하게 됩니다...

campaigns.name: 인스머스에 드리운 음모
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 인스머스의 어두운 항구, 암초에서 이상한 생물이 목격되고 실종된 정부 요원과 관련된 얽힌 계획이 풀리기 시작했습니다...

campaigns.name: 지구의 끝자락
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 얼음으로 뒤덮인 남극 대륙 깊숙한 곳에 비밀이 숨겨져 있습니다. 너무 오래되고 심오한 문제는 우리가 고향이라고 부르는 행성에 대한 우리의 이해 자체를 찢을 위험이 있습니다.

campaigns.name: 진홍색 열쇠
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 메사추세츠.아컴 시.이곳에서 기묘한 실종 사건이 잇따릅니다. 사라진 물건,건물,사람... 이들은 물리적이 아닌 역사와 기억 속에서도 말소되었는데...

campaigns.name: 돌아온 광신도의 밤
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 1925년 9월 18일 금요일. 매사추세츠 주 아컴. 이곳에서는 의문의 연쇄 실종 사건이 발생하고 있습니다. 어떤 끔찍한 고난과 공포가 기다리고 있을지...

campaigns.name: 돌아온 던위치의 유산
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 한때 괴물 같은 존재가 던위치라는 한적한 마을을 공포에 떨게 했고, 비밀 지식으로 무장한 미스캐토닉 대학의 교수들이 그 생물을 물리쳤다고 합니다...

campaigns.name: 돌아온 카르코사로 가는 길
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 몇 주 동안 다가오는 황색 옷을 입은 왕의 공연이 온 동네에서 화제가 되었지만, 연극의 어두운 역사를 조사한 후 당신은 뭔가 사악한 일이 일어나고 있다는 것을 확신하게 되었습니다...

campaigns.name: 돌아온 잊힌 시대
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 유명한 고고학자 알레한드로 벨라가 고대 아즈텍 도시의 유적을 발견했을 때, 시간의 구조 자체를 풀 수 있는 음모가 시작되었습니다...

campaigns.name: 돌아온 끝맺지 못한 의식
campaigns.author: Fantasy Flight Games
campaigns.description: 은빛 황혼회 주최 자선 행사장에서 실종 사건이 벌어지고 그것을 조사하던 당신은 숲에서 정신을 차리고 미지의 세력과 맞닥뜨립니다. 이건 안나 캐슬로가 말한 당신의 운명일까요?...

scenarios.name: The Blob that Ate Everything
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: An extraterrestrial foe with the ability to devour everything in its path has come to Arkham; it must be contained and destroyed before it is too late...

scenarios.name: Carnevale of Horrors
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: A foul conspiracy is afoot in the Venice, and something rising from the lagoon threatens to turn the mood of the city's Carnevale from celebration to terror...

scenarios.name: The Curse of the Rougarou
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: While investigating a series of recent killings in New Orleans, the curse affecting the bayou threatens to consume you as well...

scenarios.name: The Guardians of the Abyss
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: While traveling to Cairo to unravel the secrets of a medical mystery, you find yourself caught in the web of a deadly plot. A day of reckoning is coming...

scenarios.name: The Labyrinths of Lunacy
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: After being kidnapped by a mysterious mastermind, you are forced to take part in his cruel experiments in order to escape...

scenarios.name: Machinations Through Time
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: Nobel Award-winning scientists and their revolutionary discoveries have vanished and you must travel through the past, present, and future to repair the broken timeline...

scenarios.name: Murder at the Excelsior Hotel
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: The note you received read: 'Room 225. Tonight. Come Alone'. Can you figure out the truth behind the grisly murder at the Excelsior Hotel in time to clear your name?

scenarios.name: War of the Outer Gods
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: Three fantatical cults are vying to be the first to summon their patron Outer God; its up to you to thwart their devious machinations before Earth is in engulfed in all-out war...

scenarios.name: Fortune and Folly
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: A casino in Monte Carlo is twisting luck in its favor, gaining massive wealth while endangering its patrons in the process... Care to try your luck?

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: All or Nothing
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: When “Skids” O’Toole walks through the door, it’s up to you and Lady Luck to take the Clover Club for as much as you can — all before slipping out the door with your kneecaps intact...

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: Bad Blood
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: Agnes Baker may have assumed that she was alone in her modern reincarnation from a past life as a sorceress of Hyperborea, but a newcomer has come to Arkham — Elspeth Baudin...

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: By the Book
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: Roland is quickly becoming a thorn in Mr. Grey’s side and, if the politician’s underlings don’t deal with him, Mr. Grey will confront Roland himself.

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: Laid to Rest
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: It was the dead who led you to Arkham. You eke out a living playing your father’s trumpet. The dead get louder when you play. Sometimes they even compliment your music...

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: Read or Die
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: A specter from Daisy’s past rises once more as Dr. Armitage summons you to the Orne Library. Something has been unleashed on Miskatonic University, and it’s up to you to stop it...

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: Red Tide Rising
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: Wendy is dead-set on finding her father. With a Mysterious Photo as your primary tool, Wendy must find her way through the treacherous town of Innsmouth and try to gather information...

scenarios.name: Challenge Scenario: Relics of the Past
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: To better understand our future, we must first understand our past. Monterey Jack heard of the Miskatonic University's failed expedition to the jungles of Mexico. He packs his bags and makes plans for his own expedition.

scenarios.name: 한탕과 허탕
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: 지중해 면한 유명 휴양지 몬테카를로에 새로 개장한 호화 카지노에서 연일 기이한 사건이 일어나고 있습니다.

scenarios.name: Barkham Horror: The Meddling of Meowlathotep
scenarios.author: Fantasy Flight Games
scenarios.description: Barkham Horror is an alternate universe in which the conflict between humanity and the eldritch forces of the Mythos takes a back seat, and the conflict between dogs and cats takes center stage.

community.name: Fan Investigators: AHLK 조사자
community.author: Loshin
community.description: Investigators KR AHLK.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Aespa Investigators
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: Investigators inspired by the K-Pop girl group Aespa.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Artifact Expansion
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: Sidequest for magical artifacts during any scenario or campaign with new story assets, investigators, and player cards.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Bad Batch
community.author: TastyToast
community.description: A set of 6 investigators based on the Bad Batch (Star Wars). If you have anything to say about them, you can always reach me on discord at TastyToast#2882.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Baldur's Gate III
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: 331 Player Cards with 12 New Investigators from Baldur's Gate III by Larian Studios based off the Dungeons and Dragons 5e system. Alpha testing, with large changes to be expected.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Battle Goes On
community.author: The Popest
community.description: Expansion that is based on a game mode that's recently added to Sanguosha - includes animated cards!

community.name: Fan Investigators: Blood of Drakul Investigator Expansion
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)
community.description: This is a little more 'fantastical' than vanilla Arkham typically gets, but obviously there are a lot of good horror tropes to mine from the castlevania/bloodborne milleu and this tries to integrate some of those ideas in an original way.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
community.author: AtomicZ
community.description: Bring Buffy Summers and her allies into a different world of Eldritch Horror with this full investigator expansion.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Cartoon Funtime Investigators
community.author: TheBudiez
community.description: A collection of custom cartoon investigators made to be used for fun.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Circus Ex Mortis Investigator Expansion
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Welcome to the greatest show of your life! The New Moon Circus visits Arkham with a cruel and insidious plot, concerning ancient prophecy and the coming eclipse!

community.name: Fan Investigators: City of Secrets
community.author: aughhhh
community.description: This contains ten lore-friendly investigators loosely inspired by the gameplay defining mechanics introduced in the Ravnica: City of Guilds expansion for Magic the Gathering.

community.name: Fan Investigators: City of Secrets II
community.author: aughhhh
community.description: This contains ten more lore-friendly investigators loosely inspired by the gameplay defining mechanics introduced in the Ravnica: City of Guilds expansion for Magic the Gathering.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Dead Space Investigators
community.author: Kibble
community.description: A set of 5 investigators based on the Dead Space series

community.name: Fan Investigators: Delta Green Convergence
community.author: Ash (MrDodger)
community.description: Strange events are happening in the town of Groversville, events that have come to the attention of The Program, aka Delta Green.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Elspeth Baudin (As Seen in Bad Blood!)
community.author: Donelloth

community.name: Fan Investigators: Erik's Rogues
community.author: Erik T.
community.description: A set of 5 custom Arkham Horror Living Card Game investigators for the rogue class.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Flanfy's Original Gators
community.author: Flanfy
community.description: Contains five thematic investigators

community.name: Fan Investigators: Fortune or Folly - Parallel Rex Murphy
community.author: Davi
community.description: Fan-made challenge scenario for Rex Murphy

community.name: Fan Investigators: The Ghosts of Onigawa Investigator Expansion
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)
community.description: Inspired by the Ghosts of Onigawa Campaign Expansion, the Ghosts of Onigawa Investigator Expansion contains 100 custom player cards and 6 custom investigators.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Girls' Frontline
community.author: Flanfy
community.description: Contains five investigators from the Girls' Frontline mobage developed by MICA Team.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Golden Gate Investigators
community.author: tyrannonorris
community.description: This pack contains six investigators based on an unfinished campaign set in San Francisco.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Hellboy Investigators
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Is this a time shift? A dimensional overlap? Magic gone wrong? This pack contains Hellboy and the other eclectic members of the Bureau of Paranormal Research and Defense.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Kaimonogatari
community.author: toastsushi (Makima)
community.description: This expansion contains five investigators from the Monogatari series and more than 100 player cards (there is a related campaign, too!).

community.name: Fan Investigators: Lola Hayes Rework
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: Lola Hayes reimagined as a method actor. Each round, she chooses a new persona from a customizable roster of famous figures in literature, mythology, and history.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Magical Girl Arkham Project
community.author: Flanfy
community.description: ~70 investigators for the Arkham Horror LCG from the Magical Girl Raising Project light novel series, written by Asari Endou and illustrated by Marui-no.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Mass Effect
community.author: Erdjo
community.description: Mass Effect characters come to life in Arkham Horror LCG as playable investigators. The mod includes Shepard and all 19 squad members (but not Morinth).

community.name: Fan Investigators: Night of Vespers
community.author: aughhhh
community.description: Night of Vespers is a fanmade player card expansion for the Arkham Horror LCG, consisting of 126 new cards for players to use.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Ordinary Citizens
community.author: HatfulBob
community.description: A standard personal investigator expansion with normal fellas & gals as fun investigators to expand any collection! This includes six brand new investigators.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Pokemon Eldritch Edition Investigator Expansion
community.author: Goober
community.description: Pokemon: Eldritch Edition includes a full 6-scenario campaign, 2 side-stories, 5 new investigators and a whole ton of player cards, and rules for adding wild Pokemon to any campaign.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Rabbit Hole Expansion
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: Player cards that are upgrades and downgrades of official Arkham cards.

community.name: Fan Investigators: The Sands of Memphis Investigator Expansion
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)
community.description: The Sands of Memphis Investigator Expansion contains 100 custom player cards and 6 custom investigators, inspired by the forthcoming Sands of Memphis Campaign Expansion.

community.name: Fan Investigators: The Shadows of Arkham
community.author: Kyo
community.description: Several investigators and player cards

community.name: Fan Investigators: Signature Replacements
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: A set of signature replacements for each officially released Arkham investigator.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Six of Crows Investigator Expansion
community.author: Mint Tea Fan
community.description: Investigators and player cards from Leigh Bardugo's Grishaverse series.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Stargate Atlantis: Investigator Expansion
community.author: OstinatoAvocado

community.name: Fan Investigators: Strawberry Shortcake - Investigator Pack
community.author: Blankiecat
community.description: A couple of investigators based on Strawberry Shortcake - Berry in the big City.

community.name: Fan Investigators: Streets of New Capenna
community.author: Diedie

community.name: Fan Investigators: Team Fortress 2 Investigators
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: A set of 10 fan-made investigators based on Team Fortress 2

community.name: Fan Investigators: Tintin and Haddock Investigators
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: A pair of fan-made investigators

community.name: Fan Investigators: Touhou Project
community.author: CuddlyZombie
community.description: A set of five custom investigators based off the Touhou Project franchise

community.name: Fan Investigators: Witcher Horror
community.author: Ubique Sajan
community.description: Custom investigator expansion to Arkham Horror LCG - around 180 card that are based on the Witcher.

community.name: Fan Campaign: 암흑물질
community.author: Axolotl
community.description: 지금은 2147년, 당신은 버려진 것처럼 보이는 우주선에서 냉동 수면에서 막 깨어났습니다. 인류의 멸종을 막기 위해 태양계를 횡단하는 깊은 우주 모험입니다.

community.name: Fan Campaign: 역병전파자
community.author: Dr. Jack Science
community.description: 수수께끼의 역병 구름이 아컴 시에 내려오자, 수수께끼를 푸는 것은 조사자들의 몫입니다.

community.name: Fan Campaign: 이상한 나라의 앨리스
community.author: Axolotl
community.description: 이상한 나라의 앨리스는 루이스 캐럴의 이상한 나라의 앨리스와 거울나라의 모험을 각색한 8부작 캠페인입니다.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Ages Unwound
community.author: Olivia Juliet
community.description: Timey Wimey Campaign, now with actual dinosaurs! Everyone loves dinosaurs (for some reason).

community.name: Fan Campaign: Alice in Wonderland
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Alice in Wonderland is an 8-part campaign adapted from Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland and Through the Looking-Glass by Lewis Carroll.

community.name: Fan Campaign: The Approaching Storm
community.author: Kristofer Bengtsson
community.description: Your duty is to help Dr. Armitage turns into a deadly game of hide and seek, as one of his colleagues is murdered in front of your very eyes.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Betrayal at the Mountains of Madness
community.author: Jaxtrasi
community.description: It is 1935. The world has changed, and so have the investigators of Arkham.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Bloodborne - City of the Unseen
community.author: aughhhh
community.description: You awaken from an illness to an Arkham transformed, but to discover what has happened to your world, you must first survive the Hunt.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Call of the Plaguebearer
community.author: Dr. Jack Science
community.description: When mysterious plague-clouds descend upon the city of Arkham, it's up to a group of investigators to unravel the mysteries...

community.name: Fan Campaign: Celtic Rising
community.author: QggOne
community.description: A Celtic themed 5 part cycle aimed at newer players with a smaller collection.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Circus Ex Mortis Campaign Expansion
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Welcome to the greatest show of your life! The New Moon Circus visits Arkham with a cruel and insidious plot, concerning ancient prophecy and the coming eclipse!

community.name: Fan Campaign: Close Encounters of the LV-426 Kind
community.author: Adran06

community.name: Fan Campaign: The Colour Out of Oz
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: The Colour Out of Space crash lands in the magical land of Oz! Join forces with the stalwart citizens of the fairy country to stop the horrible infection!

community.name: Fan Campaign: The Crown of Egil
community.author: analyzechris
community.description: Iceland is on the verge of celebrating its 1000th year of independence, but trouble is brewing in Reykjavik.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Cyclopean Foundations
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: The archetypal campaign, with the archetypal Lovecraftian threat. The campaign masterfully uses its unique mechanic pervasively.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Dark Matter
community.author: Axolotl
community.description: It is 2147, and you have just woken up from cryo-sleep in a seemingly abandoned space ship - a deep space adventure across the solar system to prevent the extinction of the human race...

community.name: Fan Campaign: Darkham Horror
community.author: Frostmaze
community.description: Darkest Dungeon meets Arkham Horror — a match made in hell! An 8-part campaign set in the Darkest Dungeon universe (along with 5 new investigators and player cards).

community.name: Fan Campaign: The Ghosts of Onigawa Campaign Expansion
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)
community.description: The sudden disappearance of two young local girls from the remote hamlet of Minakami village draws you into a sinister plot spanning all of human history. Can you survive the twilight of Onigawa?

community.name: Fan Campaign: Half-Life
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Chaos sweeps over Arkham as portals and monsters rock the city, but this is only a prelude to the horrific events of an alien-dominated future!

community.name: Fan Campaign: Heart of Darkness
community.author: Vinn Quest
community.description: Travel deep into the heart of the Congo and navigate its perilous waters aboard the Roi des Belges to discover the Heart of Darkness.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Into the Shadowlands
community.author: John H
community.description: Prepare to unravel a new mistery in the Arkham Universe...

community.name: Fan Campaign: Jumanji
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: This is a 4-part mini-campaign for Arkham Horror: The Card Game based on the book by Chris van Allsburg and the 1995 movie adaptation of the book.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Kaimonogatari
community.author: toastsushi (Makima)
community.description: You receive a call from a Japanese contact that aided you years ago. He tells you something strange is happening in Japan. Needing a few more helping hands, you start your investigation in an unnamed town. How hard of a request could it be?

community.name: Fan Campaign: The London Set
community.author: Visitor92
community.description: 3-part fan-made campaign

community.name: Fan Campaign: Lovecrafter 3077
community.author: RudeRugg
community.description: A heavily cyber-modded femme fatale hires you to uncover the truth behind her sister’s recent death. Are you ready to be undone?

community.name: Fan Campaign: Machining a Mystery
community.author: PuertoMateo
community.description: A 7-scenario campaign inspired by Shadowrun, Steampunk, and Cyberpunk with a splash of Lovecraft-ian mythos.

community.name: Fan Campaign: The Matter of Britain
community.author: Frying Tonight
community.description: An 8 part campaign for Arkham Horror LCG based on the legend of King Arthur.

community.name: Fan Campaign: North Country Cycle
community.author: Tim Cox (rushl)
community.description: Primarily focused on lumber, the citizens of Wrotham have lived a peaceful existence. But now, they face a horror beyond their abilities. Can you help?

community.name: Fan Campaign: Of Sphinx and Sands
community.author: M M (Mat628)
community.description: You have just received a frenzied call from your good friend, Francis Morgan. He urges you to go to a museum in Beacon Hill in Boston to recover a relic he needs...

community.name: Fan Campaign: Ordo Templi Orientis
community.author: Mathieu Martin
community.description: The Ordo Templi Orientis is a 4-part campaign.

community.name: Fan Campaign: The Outsider
community.author: Carl Stephens (CapitalBathory)
community.description: A 3-part fan-made campaign

community.name: Fan Campaign: Parallel Universe
community.author: mvl4d
community.description: A 3-part fan-made campaign

community.name: Fan Campaign: Pokemon Eldritch Edition Campaign Expansion
community.author: Goober
community.description: Pokemon: Eldritch Edition includes a full 6-scenario campaign, 2 side-stories, 5 new investigators and a whole ton of player cards, and rules for adding wild Pokemon to any campaign.

community.name: Fan Campaign: The (Unofficial) Return to the Innsmouth Conspiracy
community.author: DerBK
community.description: This is a fan-made expansion that is meant to show what a Return to Innsmouth could've looked like, if it would have been released.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Souls of Darkness
community.author: JackOfHearts
community.description: The death of a mysterious collector and the relics of his estate have brought an ancient mystery to Arkham.

community.name: Fan Campaign: The War of the Worlds
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: A fanmade 3-part campaign for the Arkham Horror LCG for 1-4 players based on H.G. Wells' The War of the Worlds.

community.name: Fan Campaign: Winter Winds
community.author: Nicholas Kory
community.description: A fanmade 3-part campaign

community.name: Fan Scenario: Against the Wendigo
community.author: Vinn Quest
community.description: A sequel to the Call Of Cthulhu RPG add-on “Alone Against the Wendigo”. Several months later you explore the wild Hanninah Valley in Canada, looking for the missing students of Dr. Nadelmann’s expedition.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Arkham Incidents
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: A set of five standalone scenarios intended to be used as side-stories in campaigns. Each scenario focuses on an existing player ally and gives reward cards that synergize with that ally.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Blood Spilled in Salem
community.author: Colin Towle (Shiver02)
community.description: Prepare to investigate the United States' most iconic occult city.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Code Red at Bleeding Heart
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)
community.description: After receiving some mysterious communications from the decrepit ruins of Bleeding Heart on the outskirts of Arkham, the investigators attempt to investigate the abandoned hospital campus.

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Colour out of Space
community.author: Joe Ehret

community.name: Fan Scenario: Consternation on the Constellation
community.author: Mythos Busters

community.name: Fan Scenario: Cosmic Pantheon
community.author: Mint Tea Fan & hauke
community.description: 3 alternative factions that can be mix and matched with the 3 existing factions of War of the Outer Gods standalone.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Defense of the Arkham
community.author: Rei
community.description: Standalone scenario very losely based on MOBAs and DoTA, mostly drawing from it as a source of inspiration.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Delta Green Convergence
community.author: Ash (MrDodger)
community.description: Strange events are happening in the town of Groversville, events that have come to the attention of The Program, aka Delta Green.

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Match wits with dangerous mentalists that seek to rend the veil between life and death!

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Fall of the House of Usher
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Standalone scenario based on the Edgar Allan Poe story

community.name: Fan Scenario: Fortune or Folly - Parallel Rex Murphy Set
community.author: Davi

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Grand Oak Hotel
community.author: ArgusTheCat

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Invisible Man
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: Match wits with Griffin, a murderous chemist who has discovered the secrets of invisibility!

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: A fanmade single scenario for the Arkham Horror LCG for 1-4 players based on Washington Irving's The Legend of Sleepy Hollow.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Masks of Nyarlathotep – New York
community.author: Rob Heath (suntzu777)

community.name: Fan Scenario: Miskatonic Mouse
community.author: TerranChef
community.description: When the Happiest Place on Earth shows up outside Arkham, surely nothing sinister could be happening, right?

community.name: Fan Scenario: Mythos Deviations
community.author: TheBeard
community.description: A set of six fanmade scenarios and six investigators to integrate into the first six official campaigns.

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Nameless City
community.author: bau
community.description: A fan-made single scenario based on HP Lovecraft's short story 'The Nameless City'.

community.name: Fan Scenario: Return to the Consternation on the Constellation
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)

community.name: Fan Scenario: Return to the Wendigo
community.author: Myriad (http://arkham.cards)

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Strange Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
community.author: TheBeard

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Symphony of Erich Zann
community.author: Axolotl
community.description: Investigators must discover 'The Symphony of Erich Zann' and uncover the mystery behind the disappearance of the titular violist.

community.name: Fan Scenario: 'Tis The Season
community.author: Frying Tonight
community.description: An unnatural shopping fever has struck Arkham in the festive season and it's up to you to find out who or what is responsible. Be good for goodness sake!

community.name: Fan Scenario: The Undying
community.author: Weyird
community.description: This scenario revolves around the assault upon a village by an undead horde which the investigators must fend off.
